law.text: An employee in a pilot program may submit a request to the secretary of the Personnel Cabinet for transfer to another state position if a vacancy in that position exists. The secretary shall make every effort to accommodate this request.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 57, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 456, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994.
